Plot: A doctor working in 1980s East Germany finds herself banished to a small country hospital.
Title: Barbara
Writer: Christian Petzold (screenplay), Harun Farocki (collaborator on screenplay)
Actors: Nina Hoss, Ronald Zehrfeld, Rainer Bock, Christina Hecke
tomatoConsensus: Smart, solidly grafted, and thoroughly gripping, Barbara offers a deliberately paced, subtly powerful character study.
